title: Exquisite Polki and Pink Tourmaline Chandbali Earrings: A Touch of Hyderabadi Elegance
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features hand-cut Polki diamonds with excellent clarity and pear-shaped Pink Tourmaline cabochons. Secure post and clip closure crafted from hypoallergenic alloy.
features: Classic Chandbali silhouette with a contemporary twist. The floral motif in the lower portion is meticulously crafted using uncut Polki diamonds set in an open-back setting to maximize brilliance. The tear-drop shaped Pink Tourmaline adds a touch of regal elegance. The detailed framework is inspired by traditional Nizami jewelry designs.
colors: Predominantly gold with the shimmer of white Polki diamonds and the soft pink hue of the Tourmalines.
occasions: and other formal occasions. These earrings can also elevate a traditional attire for a festive event like Diwali or Sankranthi.
description: These Chandbali earrings embody Hyderabadi craftsmanship and tradition. The use of Polki diamonds, a signature of Indian royalty, elevates the piece. The Pink Tourmaline adds a touch of femininity and luxury. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine and prevents tarnishing, making this a valuable heirloom piece.
